articles.author: Efe Udin
articles.title: Huawei P60 series with HarmonyOS to launch globally on May 9 - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Huawei P60 series with HarmonyOS to launch globally on May 9. This is coming after the company released the Huawei nova 11i in South Africa
articles.content: Huawei officially released its own operating system, HarmonyOS (called HongmengOS in China) back in 2019. However, three years down the line, this system is yet to fully launch globally. All Huawei’s… [+5371 chars]
